code: export var WS_SUBSCRIBE="WS_SUBSCRIBE";export var WS_UNSUBSCRIBE="WS_UNSUBSCRIBE";export var WS_SEND_MESSAGE="WS_SEND_MESSAGE";export var wsConnect=function wsConnect(host){return{type:"WS_CONNECT",host:host};};export var wsDisconnect=function wsDisconnect(host){return{type:"WS_DISCONNECT",host:host};};export var wsSendMessage=function wsSendMessage(channel,datas,ack){return{type:WS_SEND_MESSAGE,channel:channel,datas:datas,ack:ack};};export var wsSubscribeChannel=function wsSubscribeChannel(channel,callback){return{type:WS_SUBSCRIBE,payload:{channel:channel,callback:callback}};};export var wsUnsubscribeChannel=function wsUnsubscribeChannel(channel){return{type:WS_UNSUBSCRIBE,payload:channel};};
